text: Alipate Aloisio Leone (born October 15, 1982), better known by his ring name Tama Tonga (), is a Tongan professional wrestler. He is currently signed to WWE, where he performs on the SmackDown brand as a member of The Bloodline. Tonga previously wrestled in New Japan Pro-Wrestling (NJPW) from 2010 to 2024, where he was a founding member of Bullet Club and Guerrillas of Destiny (G.O.D.). He and his brother Tanga Loa won the IWGP Tag Team Championship seven times, the 2020 edition of the World Tag League tournament and the ROH World Tag Team Championship once. As a singles wrestler, he won the NEVER Openweight Championship four times. On the April 12, 2024 episode of SmackDown, Tonga made his debut for WWE, and joined the Bloodline stable. He had his first WWE TV match at Backlash France on May 4, where he and Solo Sikoa defeated Kevin Owens and Randy Orton. Tonga is a former one-time WWE Tag Team Champion. His uncle and adoptive father also worked for WWE (then WWF) under the ring name Haku. == Championships and accomplishments == * Consejo Mundial de Lucha Libre ** CMLL World Tag Team Championship (2 times) – with El Terrible (1) and Rey Bucanero (1) * Jersey Championship Wrestling ** JCW Championship (1 time) * New Japan Pro-Wrestling ** IWGP Tag Team Championship (7 times) – with Tanga Loa ** NEVER Openweight Championship (4 times) ** NEVER Openweight 6-Man Tag Team Championship (4 times) – with Bad Luck Fale and Yujiro Takahashi (1), Bad Luck Fale and Tanga Loa (2), Taiji Ishimori and Tanga Loa (1) ** World Tag League (2020) – with Tanga Loa * Peachstate Wrestling Alliance ** PWA Heritage Championship (1 time) * Pro Wrestling Illustrated ** Ranked No. 94 of the top 500 singles wrestlers in the PWI 500 in 2019 ** Ranked No. 6 of the top 50 tag teams in the PWI Tag Team 50 in 2020 * Ring of Honor ** ROH World Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Tanga Loa * World Wrestling Council ** WWC World Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Idol Stevens * World Xtreme Wrestling ** WXW Television Championship (1 time) * WrestleCircus ** WC Big Top Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Tanga Loa * WWE ** WWE Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Jacob Fatu and Tonga Loa == References == == Other websites == * * * NJPW profile Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Professional wrestlers Category:WWE wrestlers Category:Tongan people
title: Tama Tonga
